entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing late this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Sunday 19 March 2023
